channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping on pavement, 17th October
item.description:
This has been here for a week, and it’s a hazard we have to walk on the road with buggies

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Adam Close, Perry Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Junction of priory park road and Tennyson road in the small square, 17th October
item.description:
See photo ... Broken pieces of a sofa chucked next to raised planter in the square. Moved to bollard at edge of the square for ease of collection

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Hazelbourne road is disgusting, 17th October
item.description:
Again this road looks disgusting. It’s just not being cleaned / litter picked regularly enough. Lots of litter including broken glass. It’s so depressing to have to report this again and again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Balham Hill, Balham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flags have been fixed to two lampposts either side of Majestic Wines, 17th October
item.description:
Fixing flags and other items to lampposts without the permission of the landowner is illegal. It is also a potential hazard to road users as they are not in proper fittings for flags. These flags have been present for more than a week.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willow Grove, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 17th October
item.description:
It looks like the contents of an entire flat was emptied out on the street yesterday in front of the blocks bin. It is the blocking the sidewalk. Other rubbish including food waste has subsequently been added to the pile increasing by the risk of vermin.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Richmond Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked on pavement illegally, 17th October
item.description:
The car was parked on the pavement illegally blocking people from getting past especially wheelchair users or people who have disability scooters or parents with push chairs or prams.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ordnance Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
